text: Huangpu, also formerly romanized Whangpoo or Whang-Po, may refer to: * Huangpu District, Shanghai, China ** Huangpu River, in Shanghai, China * Huangpu District, Guangzhou, Guangdong, China ** Huangpu Military Academy, in Guangzhou, China * Pazhou Island, formerly known as Whampoa or Huangpu, now in Haizhu District, Guangzhou, China * Huangpu, Zhongshan, a town in Zhongshan, Guangdong, China * Huangpu Road Station, a station on Line 1 in Wuhan, Hubei, China ==See also== * Whampoa (disambiguation), another former romanization of the same Chinese name * Huangfu, a Chinese surname
title: Huangpu
